# django-dataperm-model

A data model containing data permissions.

## Install

    pip install django-dataperm-model

## settings.py

    INSTALLED_APPS = [
        ......
        'dataperm',
        ......
    ]

## Installed Utils

- models
    - WithOwnerMixin

- admin
    - WithOwnerMixin


## Release Notes


### v0.1.0

- Add models.WithOwnerMixin and admin.WithOwnerMixin.
